title: Isekai no Meikyuu Toshi de Chiyu Mahoutsukai Yattemasu
original_name: 異世界の迷宮都市で治癒魔法使いやってます
sinopse:
Satou Shiki, a Japanese university student, is suddenly attacked one day by a slasher. When he opens his eyes, he finds he has been transported to another world's labyrinth city. In that another world, he who was awakened to healing magic can do a lot of "things."

(Source: MU)
